Hee">T. Hee</a><br/><i>Baby Weems</i> segment:<br/><a href="/wiki/Joe_Grant" title="Joe Grant">Joe Grant</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Dick_Huemer" title="Dick Huemer">Dick Huemer</a><br/>John Miller</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><a href="/wiki/Robert_Benchley" title="Robert Benchley">Robert Benchley</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Frances_Gifford" title="Frances Gifford">Frances Gifford</a><br/>Buddy Pepper<br/><a href="/wiki/Nana_Bryant" title="Nana Bryant">Nana Bryant</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Frank_Churchill" title="Frank Churchill">Frank Churchill</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Larry_Morey" title="Larry Morey">Larry Morey</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td>Bert Giennon</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Paul_Weatherwax" title="Paul Weatherwax">Paul Weatherwax</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios" title="Walt Disney Animation Studios">Walt Disney Productions</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/RKO_Pictures" title="RKO Pictures">RKO Radio Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li>June 20, 1941<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1941-06-20</span>)</span><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>74 minutes</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$600,000<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$960,000 (worldwide rentals) <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Jewell_3-0"><a href="#cite_note-Jewell-3">[3]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

Smith</a> <br/> <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wallace" title="Oliver Wallace">Oliver Wallace</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td><a href="/wiki/Ray_Rennahan" title="Ray Rennahan">Ray Rennahan</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Jack_Dennis" title="Jack Dennis">Jack Dennis</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios" title="Walt Disney Animation Studios">Walt Disney Productions</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/United_Artists" title="United Artists">United Artists</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li>July 17, 1943<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1943-07-17</span>)</span></li></ul>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Narrated by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Betty_Lou_Gerson" title="Betty Lou Gerson">Betty Lou Gerson</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><div class="plainlist">

<li>Tommy Luske</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Narrated by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Tom_Conway" title="Tom Conway">Tom Conway</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wallace" title="Oliver Wallace">Oliver Wallace</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios" title="Walt Disney Animation Studios">Walt Disney Productions</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/RKO_Radio_Pictures" title="RKO Radio Pictures">RKO Radio Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li>February 5, 1953<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1953-02-05</span>)</span> (United States)<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>77 minutes</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$4 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_2-0"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$87.4 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_2-1"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Paul_Smith_(composer)" title="Paul Smith (composer)">Paul Smith</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Joseph_Dubin" title="Joseph Dubin">Joseph S. Dubin</a> (orchestration)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td><a href="/wiki/Franz_Planer" title="Franz Planer">Franz Planer</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Elmo_Williams" title="Elmo Williams">Elmo Williams</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Productions</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Buena Vista Distribution</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li>December 23, 1954<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1954-12-23</span>)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>127 minutes</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$5 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$28.2 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

Blackburn">Tom Blackburn</a><br/>Norman Foster</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><a href="/wiki/Fess_Parker" title="Fess Parker">Fess Parker</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Buddy_Ebsen" title="Buddy Ebsen">Buddy Ebsen</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Jeff_York" title="Jeff York">Jeff York</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td>Thomas W. <ul><li>March 19, 1959<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1959-03-19</span>)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>104 minutes</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>under $1 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-fred_1-0"><a href="#cite_note-fred-1">[1]</a></sup> or $1,250,000<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-hedda_2-0"><a href="#cite_note-hedda-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$12.3 million (US and Canada rentals)<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-AllTime_3-0"><a href="#cite_note-AllTime-3">[3]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<ul><li>February 24, 1960<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1960-02-24</span>)</span></li></ul>

<ul><li>November 7, 1962<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1962-11-07</span>)</span> (Los Angeles)<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></li></ul>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">The Jungle Book</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Thejunglebook_movieposter.jpg" title="Drawing of a jungle. A boy wearing a red loincloth walks holding hands with a bear which holds a bunch of bananas above his head, while an orangutan follows them and a black panther watches them from behind a bush. A tiger lies on the branch of a tree while a snake comes from the leaves above. In the background, three elephants. At the top of the image, the tagline &quot;The Jungle is Jumpin'!&quot; and the title &quot;Walt Disney The Jungle Book&quot;. At the bottom, the names of the main voice actors and the characters they play."><img alt="Drawing of a jungle. </div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>113 mins.</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$3.3 million  (US/ Canada rentals)<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<ul><li>December 18, 1976<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1976-12-18</span>)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>95 minutes</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$5 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$36 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>
<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Escape from the Dark</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg"><img alt="Escape from the Dark FilmPoster.jpeg" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="240" data-file-width="416" decoding="async" height="127" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c9/Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg/220px-Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c9/Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg/330px-Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/c/c9/Escape_from_the_Dark_FilmPoster.jpeg 2x" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">UK Quad Poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Charles_Jarrott" title="Charles Jarrott">Charles Jarrott</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Ron_W._Miller" title="Ron W. Boston</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><a href="/wiki/Jeffrey_Byron" title="Jeffrey Byron">Jeffrey Byron</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Larry_Cedar" title="Larry Cedar">Larry Cedar</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/John_Cameron_(musician)" title="John Cameron (musician)">John Cameron</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td>Godfrey A. </div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/James_Horner" title="James Horner">James Horner</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Elmer_Bernstein" title="Elmer Bernstein">Elmer Bernstein</a><br/>(uncredited score<br/>withdrawn)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td><a href="/wiki/Dick_Bush" title="Dick Bush">Dick Bush</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td>David Holden<br/><a href="/wiki/Steven_Rosenblum" title="Steven Rosenblum">Steven Rosenblum</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Pictures</a><br/><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Silver_Screen_Partners_II" title="Silver Screen Partners II">Silver Screen Partners II</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Buena Vista Distribution</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Bruce_Rowland" title="Bruce Rowland">Bruce Rowland</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td>Keith Wagstaff</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td>Gary Woodyard</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Pictures</a><br/><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Silver_Screen_Partners_III" title="Silver Screen Partners III">Silver Screen Partners III</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Burrowes_Film_Group" title="Burrowes Film Group">Burrowes Film Group</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Hoyts" title="Hoyts">The Hoyts Group</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Buena Vista Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">

<ul><li>December 11, 1992<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">1992-12-11</span>)</span></li></ul>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Rudyard Kipling's The Jungle Book</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Rudyard_Kipling%27s_The_Jungle_Book_film_poster.jpg"><img alt="Rudyard Kipling's The Jungle Book film poster.jpg" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="383" data-file-width="260" decoding="async" height="324" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c8/Rudyard_Kipling%27s_The_Jungle_Book_film_poster.jpg/220px-Rudyard_Kipling%27s_The_Jungle_Book_film_poster.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/c/c8/Rudyard_Kipling%27s_The_Jungle_Book_film_poster.jpg 1.5x" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Theatrical release poster by <a href="/wiki/John_Alvin" title="John Alvin">John Alvin</a>.</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Stephen_Sommers" title="Stephen Sommers">Stephen Sommers</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Edward_S._Feldman" title="Edward S. Feldman</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Raju_Patel" title="Raju Patel">Raju Patel</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td>Stephen Sommers<br/>Ronald Yanover<br/>Mark Geldman</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Story by</th><td>Ronald Yanover<br/>Mark Geldman</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Based on</th><td><i><a href="/wiki/The_Jungle_Book" title="The Jungle Book">The Jungle Book</a></i> and <i><a href="/wiki/The_Second_Jungle_Book" title="The Second Jungle Book">The Second Jungle Book</a></i><br/>by <a href="/wiki/Rudyard_Kipling" title="Rudyard Kipling">Rudyard Kipling</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Jason_Scott_Lee" title="Jason Scott Lee">Jason Scott Lee</a></li>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">James and the Giant Peach</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:James_and_the_giant_peach.jpg"><img alt="James and the giant peach.jpg" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="376" data-file-width="264" decoding="async" height="313" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/f/f5/James_and_the_giant_peach.jpg/220px-James_and_the_giant_peach.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/f/f5/James_and_the_giant_peach.jpg 1.5x" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Theatrical release poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Henry_Selick" title="Henry Selick">Henry Selick</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Denise_Di_Novi" title="Denise Di Novi">Denise Di Novi</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Tim_Burton" title="Tim Burton">Tim Burton</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Karey_Kirkpatrick" title="Karey Kirkpatrick">Karey Kirkpatrick</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Jonathan_Roberts_(writer)" title="Jonathan Roberts (writer)">Jonathan Roberts</a><br/>Steve Bloom</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Based on</th><td><i><a href="/wiki/James_and_the_Giant_Peach" title="James and the Giant Peach">James and the Giant Peach</a></i><br/>by <a href="/wiki/Roald_Dahl" title="Roald Dahl">Roald Dahl</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/James_Horner" title="James Horner">James Horner</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Cinematography</th><td><a href="/wiki/Donald_Peterman" title="Donald Peterman">Donald Peterman</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Oliver_Wood_(cinematographer)" title="Oliver Wood (cinematographer)">Oliver Wood</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Paul_Hirsch_(film_editor)" title="Paul Hirsch (film editor)">Paul Hirsch</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Pictures</a><br/><a href="/wiki/RKO_Pictures" title="RKO Pictures">RKO Pictures</a><br/>The Jacobson Company</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Buena Vista Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>88 minutes<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$130 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Mojo_1-1"><a href="#cite_note-Mojo-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$448.2 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Mojo_1-2"><a href="#cite_note-Mojo-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Piglet's Big Movie</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Piglets_big_movie_teaser.jpg"><img alt="Piglets big movie teaser.jpg" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="384" data-file-width="260" decoding="async" height="325" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/d/d1/Piglets_big_movie_teaser.jpg/220px-Piglets_big_movie_teaser.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/d/d1/Piglets_big_movie_teaser.jpg 1.5x" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Theatrical release poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Francis_Glebas" title="Francis Glebas">Francis Glebas</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td>Michelle Pappalardo-Robinson</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>100 minutes<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-BOM_1-0"><a href="#cite_note-BOM-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$94 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-BOM_1-1"><a href="#cite_note-BOM-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$940.3 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-BOM_1-2"><a href="#cite_note-BOM-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>115 minutes<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$92 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_3-0"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-3">[3]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$633 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_3-1"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-3">[3]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<li>Outlaw Productions</li>
<li>Boxing Cat Films</li></ul>
</div></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Buena Vista Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li>November 3, 2006<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">2006-11-03</span>)</span></li></ul>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Music by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Alan_Menken" title="Alan Menken">Alan Menken</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td>Tim Mertens</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Pictures</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-afi_2-0"><a href="#cite_note-afi-2">[2]</a></sup><br/><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios" title="Walt Disney Animation Studios">Walt Disney Animation Studios</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-nytimes_3-0"><a href="#cite_note-nytimes-3">[3]</a></sup></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures</a><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-afi_2-1"><a href="#cite_note-afi-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Mars Needs Moms</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Mars_Needs_Moms!_Poster.jpg"><img alt="Mars Needs Moms! <li>Wendy Wells</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Based on</th><td><i>Mars Needs Moms!</i><br/>by <a href="/wiki/Berkeley_Breathed" title="Berkeley Breathed">Berkeley Breathed</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>102 minutes<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$150 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-3"><a href="#cite_note-3">[3]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_4-0"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-4">[4]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$1.280 billion<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-mojo_4-1"><a href="#cite_note-mojo-4">[4]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Maleficent</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Maleficent_poster.jpg" title="A vengeful fairy dressed black with her black horns standing and title below"><img alt="A vengeful fairy dressed black with her black horns standing and title below" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="326" data-file-width="220" decoding="async" height="326" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/5/55/Maleficent_poster.jpg" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Theatrical release poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Robert_Stromberg" title="Robert Stromberg">Robert Stromberg</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Joe_Roth" title="Joe Roth">Joe Roth</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Linda_Woolverton" title="Linda Woolverton">Linda Woolverton</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Based on</th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Edited by</th><td>Tim Mertens</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;">Production<br/>company </div></th><td><div style="vertical-align:middle;"><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Pictures">Walt Disney Pictures</a><br/><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Animation_Studios" title="Walt Disney Animation Studios">Walt Disney Animation Studios</a></div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Distributed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_Motion_Pictures" title="Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures">Walt Disney Studios<br/>Motion Pictures</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Release date</div></th><td><div class="plainlist">

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;"><div style="display:inline-block; padding:0.1em 0;line-height:1.2em;white-space:normal;">Running time</div></th><td>109 minutes<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-1"><a href="#cite_note-1">[1]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Country</th><td>United States</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Language</th><td>English</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Budget</th><td>$100–130 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-3"><a href="#cite_note-3">[3]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Deadline-Wrinkle-1stWeekendBoxOffice-2018_4-0"><a href="#cite_note-Deadline-Wrinkle-1stWeekendBoxOffice-2018-4">[4]</a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Box office</th><td>$133.4 million<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-BOM_5-0"><a href="#cite_note-BOM-5">[5]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-6"><a href="#cite_note-6">[6]</a></sup></td></tr></tbody></table>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Lady and the Tramp</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="new" href="//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Upload?wpDestFile=LadyandtheTramp2019OfficialPoster.png" title="File:LadyandtheTramp2019OfficialPoster.png">File:LadyandtheTramp2019OfficialPoster.png</a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Official release poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Charlie_Bean_(filmmaker)" title="Charlie Bean (filmmaker)">Charlie Bean</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Brigham_Taylor" title="Brigham Taylor">Brigham Taylor</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td><div class="plainlist">

<li>Kari Granlund</li></ul>

<li>February 7, 2020<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday dtstart published updated">2020-02-07</span>)</span> (<a href="/wiki/Disney%2B" title="Disney+">Disney+</a>)</li></ul>

<table class="infobox vevent" style="width:22em;font-size:90%;"><tbody><tr><th class="summary" colspan="2" style="text-align:center;font-size:125%;font-weight:bold;font-size:110%;font-style:italic;">Flora &amp; Ulysses</th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" style="text-align:center"><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Flora_and_Ulysses_Poster.jpg"><img alt="Flora and Ulysses Poster.jpg" class="thumbborder" data-file-height="384" data-file-width="260" decoding="async" height="325" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/d/dc/Flora_and_Ulysses_Poster.jpg/220px-Flora_and_Ulysses_Poster.jpg" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/d/dc/Flora_and_Ulysses_Poster.jpg 1.5x" width="220"/></a><div style="font-size:95%;padding:0.35em 0.35em 0.25em;line-height:1.25em;">Official release poster</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Directed by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Lena_Khan" title="Lena Khan">Lena Khan</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Produced by</th><td>Gil Netter</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Screenplay by</th><td><a href="/wiki/Brad_Copeland" title="Brad Copeland">Brad Copeland</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Based on</th><td><i><a href="/wiki/Flora_%26_Ulysses" title="Flora &amp; Ulysses">Flora &amp; Ulysses</a></i><br/>by <a href="/wiki/Kate_DiCamillo" title="Kate DiCamillo">Kate DiCamillo</a></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" style="white-space:nowrap;padding-right:0.65em;">Starring</th><td><div class="plainlist">
